description.value: As an enemy retreats, you use the opening to attack. When an enemy voluntarily leaves your reach, you can use this reaction and spend 1 focus to make a melee weapon attack against the enemy’s Physical defense. You can’t use this reaction to attack a character who transports themself with Transportation or who otherwise moves instantaneously.
